plot: Dave proposes to Brooke but she asks for time to think about it. Bill pressures Margo to tell him about Ridge but she refuses. Storm and Dave argue about using Brooke as a decoy. Eric confronts Ridge about whether or not he loves Caroline.

Eric and Stephanie think of the newly engaged Ridge and Caroline. They realize that after nearly 30 years of matrimony they have gained wealth and fame but lost love and affection for each other. Dave proposes to Brooke but she asks for time to think about it. Bill pressures Margo to tell him about Ridge but she refuses. Storm and Dave argue about using Brooke as a decoy. Eric confronts Ridge about whether or not he loves Caroline.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
